named-query.name: BC_READ_PRODUCTS_BY_NAME
named-query.query: SELECT product FROM org.broadleafcommerce.catalog.domain.Product product WHERE product.name LIKE :name

named-query.name: BC_READ_ACTIVE_PRODUCTS_BY_CATEGORY
named-query.query: SELECT categoryProductXref.product FROM org.broadleafcommerce.catalog.domain.CategoryProduct categoryProductXref WHERE categoryProductXref.category.id = :categoryId AND categoryProductXref.product.activeStartDate <= CURRENT_DATE AND (categoryProductXref.product.activeEndDate > CURRENT_DATE OR categoryProductXref.product.activeEndDate = null) ORDER BY categoryProductXref.displayOrder
